participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Alex often finds solace in music and nature, using them as an escape from reality.
participant_1.background: I lamp on the weekends in the forest. There I am a general of an oris army. In reality I am 32 and live at home with my mother. I could move out, but she does not want me to. I miss my dad.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and organized, Jamie thrives in her musical pursuits and maintains a structured life to keep her creativity in check.
participant_2.background: I am in high school apart of the school band. I love watching Grey's Anatomy. Music has always been my number one passion. My mom is my favorite person of all people. I have to live by a schedule in order to keep my mind right.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love music. It's my number one passion.
That's cool! I love music too. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock.
I like rock too! What's your favorite rock band?
I have a lot of favorite rock bands, but my favorite is probably Queen.
Queen is great! I love their music.
Me too! What about you, what's your favorite band?
My favorite band is probably Aerosmith.
Aerosmith is great! I love their music too.
What do you like about Aerosmith?
I love their music and their energy. They're just a really fun band to listen to.
I agree! They're one of my favorite bands too.
Have you ever seen them in concert?
Yes, I have! I saw them a few years ago and it was amazing.
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to see them in concert.
You should definitely see them if you get the chance. It's a really great show.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!
